name: Tai Kamiya
effect: [Your Turn] When one of your Digimon with [Agumon] or [Greymon] in its name moves from the breeding area to the battle area, gain 1 memory and trigger ＜Draw 1＞. (Draw 1 card from your deck.)[Main][Once Per Turn] Digivolve your [Agumon] into 1 [Agumon - Bond of Bravery] in your hand for its digivolution cost, ignoring its level. If you do, trash the top 2 cards of your security stack. Then, if you have 1 or more security cards, delete that Digimon at the end of the turn.
security_effect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.
